apps.name: Resilient Land Mapping Tool
apps.logoAlt: Center for Resilient Conservation Science Logo
apps.desc: This tool allows for exploration and analysis of terrestrial resilience data and the RCN.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Resilient Land Mapping Tool

apps.name: Marine Mapping Tool
apps.logoAlt: Center for Resilient Conservation Science Logo
apps.desc: Marine Mapping Tool for the Atlantic coast of the Northeast and Southeast U.S.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Marine Mapping Tool

apps.name: Reconnecting Appalachian Rivers
apps.logoAlt: Center for Resilient Conservation Science Logo
apps.desc: This is a screening tool to identify HUC-12 watersheds where restoration of freshwater connectivity might benefit both nature and people.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Reconnecting Appalachian Rivers

apps.name: Chesapeake Fish Passage Prioritiation
apps.logoAlt: Center for Resilient Conservation Science Logo
apps.desc: This tool evaluates and prioritizes dams and other in-stream barriers to aquatic organism passage to help inform aquatic connectivity restoration projects in the Chesapeake Bay watershed.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Chesapeake Fish Passage Prioritiation

apps.name: Northeast Habitat Map
apps.logoAlt: Center for Resilient Conservation Science Logo
apps.desc: The dataset maps the type and distribution of 140 types of natural systems.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Northeast Habitat Map

apps.name: Metro Denver Regional Conservation Assessment
apps.desc: The RCA identifies high-priority places in the seven-county metro Denver region to protect, connect, restore, and enhance for people and nature.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Metro Denver Regional Conservation Assessment

apps.name: TNC Maine Mapping Portal
apps.desc: Web mapping applications for The Nature Conservancy in Maine.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool TNC Maine Mapping Portal

apps.name: Dangermond Preserve - Historical Imagery
apps.desc: Display various historical imagery in and around the Jack and Laura Dangermond Preserve.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Dangermond Preserve - Historical Imagery

apps.name: Landfire
apps.desc: The LANDFIRE Web–Hosted Applications Map WHAM! is an online, interactive map that calls up many of the applications, their locations, and the partners we work with.

apps.name: Migrations in Motion
apps.desc: This map shows the average direction mammals, birds, and amphibians need to move to track hospitable climates as they shift across the landscape.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Migrations in Motion

apps.name: African Great Lakes Atlas
apps.desc: This Story Map focuses on seven of Africa’s Great Lakes: Albert, Edward, Kivu, Malawi/Nyasa/Niassa, Tanganyika, Victoria, and Turkana.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool African Great Lakes Atlas

apps.name: NASCA Dashboard
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool NASCA Dashboard

apps.name: NASCA Viewer
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool NASCA Viewer

apps.name: Osborne Fire Lookout
apps.desc: Between 1933 and 1935, the Forest Service in Oregon and Washington undertook an ambitious project to collect high quality photos from every fire lookout in the region.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Osborne Fire Lookou

apps.name: High Allegheny Priority Hemlock Conservation Areas
apps.desc: This map displays the priority areas for the conservation of eastern hemlock considering the impending impacts of hemlock woolly adelgid on the High Allegheny Plateau.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool High Allegheny Priority Hemlock Conservation Areas

apps.name: Chesapeake Bay Marsh Management
apps.desc: The Marsh Management Decision Tool is a guidance system that provides the user with recommended marsh management techniques.
apps.alt: Image of mapping tool Chesapeake Bay Marsh Management
